aboutinstitut.title: About Our Institute
aboutinstitut.text1: Jizzakh Polytechnic Institute is a higher educational institution founded in 1989, which trains specialists in chemical technology, automotive industry, construction and farming. The institute has faculties of automation, engineering economics, industrial technology and construction, as well as correspondence faculties. The full-time department prepares bachelors in 13 specialties, masters in 4 specialties; the correspondence department prepares bachelors in 16 specialties. In the 2000/2001 academic year, more than 1,900 students studied. The institute has 18 departments, 4 scientific laboratories and a library with a collection of more than 67,000 books. By 2002, more than 6,500 specialists had been trained.
aboutinstitut.text2: Our goal is to equip students not only with theoretical knowledge but also with practical skills, preparing them fully for the job market.
